sources.title: Crazy Kind of Love (ROMANTIC COMEDY in German, full-length romantic comedy, comedy films)
Crazy kind of love (2013) Zach Gilford & Amanda Crew: Romance is a Total Disaster!
sources.description:
A broken family finds their relationships to one another changed by a new arrival in the household.

Original title: Crazy Kind of Love
Alternative titles: Сумасшедший вид любви (Russian), Loca clase de amor (Spanish), Aşkın Çılgın Hali (Turkish), Божевільний вид кохання (Ukrainian), Neprātīgā mīlestība (Latvian)

Director: Sarah Siegel-Magness
Writers: Karen McCullah, April Stevens (based on the novel; Angel Angel)

Main cast:
Virginia Madsen – Augusta Iris
Graham Rogers – Henry Iris
Amanda Crew – Bette
Zach Gilford – Matthew Iris
Sam Trammell – Jeff
Madeline Zima – Annie
Kristoffer Ryan Winters – David 
Anthony LaPaglia – Gordie Iris
Aly Michalka – Janeen
Lin Shaye – Denise Mack
Kathleen Wilhoite – Doris
Eva Longoria – Marion
Bobbi Sue Luther – Bartender
Christopher Atkins – Mr. Jeffries

Genres: Drama, Comedy, Romance
Release date: May 31, 2013
Filming location: Los Angeles, California, USA


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: While re-evaluating her life as a newly single mother, a woman relies on her carefree son and his awkward brother to keep their lives interesting. When an unlikely romance blossoms between the youngest son and the new girl in town, she realizes the key to her happiness can be found where she least expects it, and there's only one kind of love worth living for - the crazy kind.
metadata.Actors: Virginia Madsen, Graham Rogers, Amanda Crew
